name: Glacial Corrupter
description: The Glacial Corrupter is a medium undead creature, exhibiting a chilling aura and a haunting appearance typical of its kind.
memorable: Inflicts ongoing cold damage and can raise victims as undead.
goals: To inflict suffering and recruit victims into its ranks as undead.
relations: May be encountered alongside other undead creatures or in icy regions.
environment: Typically found in cold, desolate locations.
strengths: High Constitution grants it resilience; immune to cold and poison damage.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma make it vulnerable in mental contests.
attacks: Uses a longsword for slashing damage or a longbow for piercing attacks, and its Glacial Touch ability inflicts cold damage with lingering effects.
most_powerful_ability: Glacial Touch can deal initial cold damage and cause ongoing damage if not treated, creating a persistent threat.
senses: Has darkvision to navigate in darkness.
additional_information: Immune to exhaustion, poisoned, and petrified conditions.
Can create more Glacial Corrupters by defeating humanoids with Glacial Touch.
Reprises threats over time by raising defeated foes as undead.
Effective in combat with melee and ranged options.

monster that raises victims as undead
